item.title: TIL: The Fisher-Yates Shuffle
item.description: … or how to efficiently produce a permutation of a set of elements. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisher%E2%80%93Yates_shuffle Incidentally, it is available in math/rand since Go 1.10. Look for enlightenment here.

item.title: Inspiration
item.description: I just found a reference to this article by Peter Norvig: Teach Yourself Programming in Ten Years. Recommended reading.
